XIII.ii.5.A.1.c
.
Who May Sign the Certificate for an Appointment to a Service Academy
A Senior Veterans Service Representative or other designee may sign the certificate in the name of the Veterans Service Center Manager or Pension Management Center Manager.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A - Certification for Service Academy Appointment
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A
